sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"paragon---processes"}}>{`Paragon - Processes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"build-process"}}>{`Build process`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"using-the-gui"}}>{`Using the GUI`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The process of the GUI will build out the following for lift:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`CircleCI file`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Project name`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Routes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Colours`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Fonts`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Pages`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Components`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Layout`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Copy`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"post-build-phase"}}>{`Post build phase`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`After the build phase, there is a bootstrap script to get up the initial build:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-bash"}}>{`─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
       │ File: /usr/local/dok/paragon
─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
   1   │ #!/bin/bash
   2   │ prj react-redux
   3   │ kratos install
   4   │ shotgun run
   5   │ lift up
   6   │ shotgun run
   7   │ mv ./copy.json ./src/data/copy.json
   8   │ mv ./config.json ./src/config.json
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This process will do the following:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Update the React project to React-Redux`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Install all the required Kratos dependencies`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Run all the install.sh scripts in the project`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Run Lift to build out the rest of the required files`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Run all the install.sh scripts in the project post-Lift`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Move the auto-generated copy.json and config.json into the project`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
